general.check_help: Please check help on how to use this this command.
general.commands_available:
Hey There! My name is Alita.
I'm here to help you manage your groups!
Commands available:
 √ó /start: Start the bot
 √ó /help: Give's you this message.
 √ó /donate: Information related about how to donate!

All commands can either be used with / or !.
